summary: Accomplished estimator with 15+ years in construction, delivering optimizations. Customized solutions for top infrastructure projects.

bullets.text: Led complex BOQ projects for diverse infrastructure, influencing budget alignment and strategic planning for $7M in awarded contracts.
Executed detailed quantifications, incorporating cost analytics with precision across systems like architectural, structural, and MEP.
Coordinated procurement with meticulous cost assessments, upgrading design variation impact and sustaining fiscal efficiency.
Developed intricate tendering proposals maximizing competitive advantage, aiding in capturing $9M USD in projects.
Managed final project accounting with robust accuracy, adapting real-time adjustments and optimizations at critical stages.
Oversaw the design and monitoring report processes, increasing department adherence to budgetary constraints by 20%.
Drove BOQs in commercial and religious buildings, meeting multifaceted objectives and elevating bid win rates by 30%.
Led cost analysis for top-tier infrastructure projects with a precision-targeted approach, totaling $8.0M in secured contracts.
Implemented estimating strategies that cut project preparatory costs by 15%, optimizing resource allocation effectively.
Formulated detailed BOQs within extensive sub-contractor frameworks, improving proposal success rates by 25%.
Developed modular and scalable cost structures, streamlining site logistics support and reducing waste by 18%.
Oversaw quantitative assessments of complex civil constructions, verifying compliance against Global Engineering Standards.
Enhanced supplier relations through strategic negotiations, achieving 12% reductions in material and installation expenses.
Supervised integrated cost control systems to maintain project budget adherence, resulting in a 92% adherence rate.
Played an integral role in project teams, securing contracts worth $25.2M through detailed BOQ and tender documentation.
Collaborated in the financial oversight of key projects, ensuring alignment between design evolution and fiscal limits.
Implemented rigorous cost evaluation processes, minimizing variation expense impact by 22% across project spectrum.
Guided dispute resolution sessions on financial allocations, securing advantageous outcomes in contractor agreements.
Formed clear site layouts that mitigated logistical challenges, streamlining construction timelines by 15%.
Advised on technical proposals, leveraging advanced methods to refine contractual bidding strategies.
Directed the integration of construction methodologies within commercial tender proposals, enhancing contract acquisition.
Executed accurate quantity take-offs, leading to cost-efficient high-rise residential development approvals valued at $4.0M.
Synthesized cost data into dynamic proposals, enhancing investment frameworks and financing outcomes.
Analyzed and managed project feasibility, yielding actionable insights that drove land acquisition decisions.
Steered feasibility studies that facilitated financial viability analyses for substantial logistics projects spanning 18,225 m².
Crafted initial cost assessments, building investor confidence with robust forecasting and logistical plans.
Provided comprehensive project support, directly contributing to cost-saving initiatives resulting in an $9.6M hospital expansion.
Facilitated effective site service evaluations, optimizing service executions and achieving a 0% error record.
Orchestrated advanced cost estimation methodologies for expansions in retail and healthcare, furthering corporate reach.
Documented financial negotiating strategies, aiding management in reconciling project budgets effectively.
Collaborated on drafting contractual documents, instrumental in securing high-value agreements under competitive terms.
Assessed developmental stages, offering strategic advisory on construction timelines and variability costs.
